channel.title: Attempting to portforward w/ utorrent & no-ip
channel.description:
i have a demise pking source and client, a no-ip, utorrent, and i'd like to portforward :D i saw a guide and followed it but i really dont know if i did it right, and i dont think i did. it says when i start up my source "you've got another server open :p" so idk tbh. has anyone ever used demise pking source and client?
here is what canyouseeme.org said
Error: I could not see your service on "IP Address" on port (43594) Reason: Connection timed out
or
Error: I could not see your service on "IP Address" on port (43594) Reason: Connection refused
and this is what my source "run" says when i start it up, before i even open the client
Loaded WorldMap In (704 ms)... Youve got another server open :P
anyone help? :s

item.title: Attempting to portforward w/ utorrent & no-ip
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

i0b 0n:

just buy vps.

but see heres the problem. im lazy and i dont wanna buy it. im only hosting for like 4 friends plus me making it like 5 lol. so my connection is too bad for utorrent but i just need something a little better.

Read full topic

item.title: Attempting to portforward w/ utorrent & no-ip
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

.:BOOM:.:

I portfoward with utorrent and i also have a router… but its not in the portforward.com list so i use utorrent in my opinion its much easier and greater

well i did get it but my connection at my house sucks. it lags bad. what else should i do then instead? webclient? i have stuff people can download, idc if it has antileech or not. its just editted. what should i do?

Read full topic
